page.title: 09LIBRARY SERVICES ON RHUM
page.content:
A supply of free loan library books are sent to Rhum from Inverness. The adult books go to the library in the shop while the children's books go to the school. These boxes of books are changed every three months or so.
The children are also members of various bookclubs. The children choose the books they wish to buy, if any, and the order is sent off by the teacher. These books are sent by post and are distributed by the school.
The school also has a small selection of children's fiction and non_fiction materials which they may borrow at any time.
